00023         private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00024         {
00025             mySqlConn conn = new mySqlConn();
00026             conn.connect();
00027             BindingSource bSource = new BindingSource();
00028             string sQuery = "SELECT id_member MID, member_number NO, firstName as 'First Name', lastName 'Last Name', DATE_FORMAT(birthdate,\"%d/%m/%Y\") DOB, email 'EMail' FROM members ORDER BY id_member";
00029             bSource.DataSource = conn.dtGetTableForDataGrid(sQuery);
00030             dg_members.DataSource = bSource;
00031             dg_members.AllowUserToAddRows = false;
00032             dg_members.ReadOnly = true;
00033         }

00053         private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00054         {
00055             mySqlConn conn = new mySqlConn();
00056             conn.connect();
00057             BindingSource bSource = new BindingSource();
00058             string sQuery = "SELECT id_member MID, member_number NO, firstName as 'First Name', lastName 'Last Name', DATE_FORMAT(birthdate,\"%d/%m/%Y\") DOB, email 'EMail' FROM members WHERE id_member > 0 ";
00059             if (txt_firstName.Text != "")
00060                 sQuery += " AND firstName LIKE '%"+txt_firstName.Text+"%'";
00061             if (txt_lastName.Text != "")
00062                 sQuery += " AND lastName LIKE '%" + txt_lastName.Text + "%'";
00063             if (txt_email.Text != "")
00064                 sQuery += " AND email LIKE '%" + txt_email.Text + "%'";
00065             if (txt_membernum.Text != "")
00066                 sQuery += " AND member_number LIKE '%" + txt_membernum.Text + "%'";
00067             string sDate = Utils.sGetMysqlDate(txt_dob.Text);
00068             if (sDate != "0000-00-00")
00069                 sQuery += " AND birthdate = '" + sDate + "'";
00070 
00071             sQuery += "  ORDER BY id_member";
00072 
00073             bSource.DataSource = conn.dtGetTableForDataGrid(sQuery);
00074             dg_members.DataSource = bSource;
00075             dg_members.AllowUserToAddRows = false;
00076             dg_members.ReadOnly = true;
00077         }
